name: 50% Puzzle
description:
This game is a half-full glass! Fun and simple, play more than 400 levels (the cutest casting of pictures).
Yet challenging, only 3% get the Perfect reward for each level.

50% is a free puzzle game. Suitable for all ages, fun and relaxation guaranteed!

HOW TO PLAY:
• Slice and/or turn the line till you think you get 50% of the shape covered.
• The more you get close to it, the more you'll reveal the details of the shape and get stars.
• Get at least 1 star to go through the next level or try again to get a better result.
• If you set the line at 50%, you'll get a Perfect.

FEATURES:
• Free to play, play it anywhere anytime.
• Suitable for all ages.
• Cute images hide in the shape, find them out.
• Worth replay to get a Perfect.
